content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received a command to search for the best hiking, camping, and kayaking locations. The AI returned a list of web search results containing information on various locations and tips for kayak camping. I then wrote the list of best kayak camping trips and places to go to a file named "locations.txt". The AI also provided additional information on kayaking spots in Makena Beach, Maui and the Indian River Canoe Trail in Michigan. It also gave tips for kayak camping, stating that much of the same equipment used for backpacking can be used for kayak camping. The command to write to file was successful.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.cityhistorywebsite.com", "question": "What are the most important landmarks and events in the city\'s history?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command browse_website returned: Error: unknown error: net::ERR_NAME_NOT_RESOLVED', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "best camping locations in [area]"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://theplanetd.com/top-10-best-places-camp-california/", "https://www.travelandleisure.com/trip-ideas/nature-travel/most-scenic-campgrounds-in-us", "https://www.cntraveler.com/gallery/the-best-place-to-camp-in-every-state", "https://thedyrt.com/magazine/featured/awards/2022-top-10-places-to-camp-in-the-us/", "https://www.utah.com/things-to-do/outdoor-recreation/camping/best-camping-in-utah/", "https://www.timeout.com/california/things-to-do/best-camping-in-california", "https://blog.virginia.org/2016/03/16-amazing-camping-locations-virginia/", "https://www.beyondthetent.com/camping-in-missouri/"]', type='action_result')]
"""
